title: Rectangular 7p Land For Sale
details:
Clear title - land bought from bank loan.

Situated in Gangarama Road, Werahera, Boralesgamuwa

* One km to Rathmalana (Galle Road)

* Land is very close to major cities such as Rathmalana, Dehiwala, Maharagama, Mount Lavania, Pilliyandala & Papiliyana

* Walking / jogging / cycling tracks / children's park and well quipped gyms are located just few minutes drive away from the land.

* All four major supermarkets Keells, Arpico, Laugfs, Cargills food city and restaurants such as Pizza Hut, Dominos, Vegi Dine located close by.

* All leading banks BOC, NSB, Peoples, Hatton National, Commercial, Seylan, Nations Trust, NDB, Seylan..etc located within close proximity.

* Close to Sir John Kotelawala Defense University.

* Serene and peaceful surrounding

Genuine buyers are encouraged & invited to make reasonable offers after inspection of the property, since the sale will take place at the Best Offer Received.

No brokers please

Contact on 076 5463088/0777540595
